comments.content:
Detailed report: https://oss-fuzz.com/testcase?key=5637431891591168

Project: hostap

Crash Type: Heap-buffer-overflow READ 1
Crash Address: 0x61800000079d
Crash State:
  asn1_get_next
  x509_parse_ext_basic_constraints
  x509_parse_extension
  
Sanitizer: address (ASAN)

Recommended Security Severity: Medium

Regressed: https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=afl_asan_hostap&range=201906130234:201906140238

Reproducer Testcase: https://oss-fuzz.com/download?testcase_id=5637431891591168

Issue filed automatically.

See https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/blob/master/docs/reproducing.md for instructions to reproduce this bug locally.

This bug is subject to a 90 day disclosure deadline. If 90 days elapse
without an upstream patch, then the bug report will automatically
become visible to the public.

ClusterFuzz testcase 5637431891591168 is verified as fixed in https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=afl_asan_hostap&range=201906220236:201906230234

If this is incorrect, please file a bug on https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues/new

This bug has been fixed for 30 days. It has been opened to the public.
